note.p: Artist and civil servant. Son of the entomologist Frederick Smith. Provided insect illustrations for CD’s Descent and other natural history books. Employed by the General Post Office, eventually attaining post of Assistant Controller by 1901.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/128/38/33), 1901 (RG13/435/65/11)
Correspondence vol. 17, letter to E. A. Smith, 30 June [1869]
